entry.title: ç»•è¿‡ GPGMail çš„æ¿€æ´»æ£€æµ‹
entry.content:
å‰æ®µæ—¶é—´ GPGMail å®£å¸ƒä¸å†å…è´¹ï¼Œåœ¨ä¸‰åå¤©çš„è¯•ç”¨æœŸåå°±ä¸ç»™ç”¨äº†ã€‚å”‰ï¼Œå¯èƒ½æ˜¯å®˜æ–¹å®åœ¨æ²¡é’±ç»´æŠ¤äº†ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯èƒ½æ˜¯å®˜æ–¹æƒ³èµšé’±äº†ã€‚ä¸è¿‡ï¼Œæ—¢ç„¶ GPGMail é‡‡ç”¨çš„æ˜¯è‡ªç”±çš„è®¸å¯è¯ï¼Œæ„å‘³ç€æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥è‡ªå·±å¯¹ä»£ç è¿›è¡Œæ›´æ”¹ã€‚å’Œè®¸å¯è¯éªŒè¯ç›¸å…³çš„ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

å¦ï¼šè¿˜æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªç›´æ¥å¯¹äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ‰“ patch çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼ˆä»ç„¶ç¬¦åˆè®¸å¯è¯ï¼‰ï¼Œåˆ©ç”¨äº†æœ€è¿‘æ‰“ CTF å­¦åˆ°çš„ä¸€äº›çŸ¥è¯†ã€‚æ‰¾åˆ°ä»¥ä¸Šè¿™ä¸ªå‡½æ•°ï¼Œç„¶åæŠŠè¿”å›å€¼ä¿®æ”¹æˆéé›¶å³å¯ã€‚è¿™é‡Œå°±ä¸æä¾›æ–¹æ³•äº†ã€‚æœ€åçš„æ›´æ”¹ï¼š

entry.title: åœ¨ macOS çš„ VirtualBox ä¸Šä» USB å¯åŠ¨
entry.content:
åšäº†ä¸€ä¸ª Windows 10 å®‰è£… U ç›˜ï¼Œæƒ³æµ‹è¯•ä¸€ä¸‹èƒ½ä¸èƒ½å¯åŠ¨ï¼Œäºæ˜¯æƒ³ç”¨ VirtualBox èµ·ä¸€ä¸ªè™šæ‹Ÿæœºã€‚ä½†æ˜¯å‘ç°ï¼Œä¸€èˆ¬æƒ…å†µä¸‹è¦ä» ISO æˆ–è€…æŠŠ U ç›˜å…‹éš†æˆä¸€ä¸ª vdi/vmdk etc å†å¯åŠ¨ã€‚ä¸è¿‡æ‰¾åˆ°äº† Cem Arslan çš„ VirtualBox - Booting From USB (MAC) å®éªŒäº†ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œç¡®å®å¯ä»¥ç”¨ï¼Œä»¥ /dev/disk2 ä¸ºä¾‹æ–¹æ³•å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

$ diskutil unmountDisk /dev/disk2
$ sudo chown $(whoami) /dev/disk2
$ VBoxManage internalcommands createrawvmdk -filename PATH_TO_VMDK -rawdisk /dev/disk2
$ # Now boot from VirtualBox

å¯¹äºå…¶å®ƒå¹³å°ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å‚è€ƒ Tu Nguyen çš„ How to boot from USB in VirtualBox ã€‚

ç ”ç©¶äº†ä¸€ä¸‹ç”Ÿæˆçš„ vmdk æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå¤§æ¦‚æ˜¯è¿™æ ·çš„ï¼š

# Disk DescriptorFile
version=1
CID=12345678
parentCID=ffffffff
createType="fullDevice"

# Extent description
RW 12345678 FLAT "/dev/disk2" 0

# The disk Data Base

ddb.geometry.cylinders="1234"
ddb.geometry.heads="1234"
ddb.geometry.sectors="1234"

ddb.geometry.biosHeads="1234"

entry.title: åœ¨ macOS ä¸Šè¯»å–ç§»åŠ¨ç¡¬ç›˜çš„ S.M.A.R.T. ä¿¡æ¯
entry.content:
ä¹‹å‰æƒ³çœ‹çœ‹è‡ªå·±å„ä¸ªç›˜çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å‘ç°åªèƒ½çœ‹ç”µè„‘å†…ç½®çš„ SSD çš„ S.M.A.R.T ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œè€Œç§»åŠ¨ç¡¬ç›˜çš„éƒ½æ˜¾ç¤ºï¼š

$ smartctl -a /dev/disk2
smartctl 6.6 2017-11-05 r4594 [Darwin 17.7.0 x86_64] (local build)
Copyright (C) 2002-17, Bruce Allen, Christian Franke, www.smartmontools.org

/dev/disk2: Unable to detect device type
Please specify device type with the -d option.

Use smartctl -h to get a usage summary

ä¸€å¼€å§‹æˆ‘æ€€ç–‘æ˜¯ä¸ªåˆ«ç›˜ä¸æ”¯æŒï¼Œä½†æ¢äº†å‡ ä¸ªç›˜éƒ½ä¸èƒ½å·¥ä½œï¼Œé—®é¢˜åº”è¯¥å‡ºç°åœ¨äº† USB ä¸Šã€‚æŸ¥äº†ä¸‹èµ„æ–™ï¼Œæœç„¶å¦‚æ­¤ã€‚æ ¹æ® USB devices and smartmontools ï¼Œè·å– S.M.A.R.T ä¿¡æ¯éœ€è¦ç›´æ¥å‘é€ ATA å‘½ä»¤ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ç”±äºç»è¿‡äº† USB ï¼Œäºæ˜¯éœ€è¦è¿›è¡Œä¸€ä¸ªè½¬æ¢ï¼Œå¯¼è‡´æ— æ³•ç›´æ¥å‘é€ ATA å‘½ä»¤ã€‚è¿™ä¸ªé—®é¢˜è‡ªç„¶æ˜¯æœ‰è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼Œå¤§æ¦‚å°±æ˜¯ç›´æ¥æŠŠ ATA å‘½ä»¤å‘é€è¿‡å»ï¼ˆpass-throughï¼‰ã€‚ä¸Šé¢è¿™ä¸ªåœ°å€é‡Œå†™åˆ°ï¼Œå¦‚æœéœ€è¦åœ¨ macOS ä¸Šä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œéœ€è¦å®‰è£…ä¸€ä¸ªå†…æ ¸é©±åŠ¨ã€‚å¯ä»¥æ‰¾åˆ°ï¼Œæºç åœ¨ kasbert/OS-X-SAT-SMART-Driver å¹¶ä¸”æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå¸¦ç­¾åçš„å®‰è£…åŒ…åœ¨ External USB / FireWire drive diagnostics support ä¸­å¯ä»¥ä¸‹è½½ã€‚ä¸¢åˆ° VirusTotal ä¸Šæ²¡æŸ¥å‡ºé—®é¢˜ï¼Œç”¨ v0.8 ç‰ˆæœ¬å®‰è£…å¥½åå°±æˆåŠŸåœ°è¯»å–åˆ°äº†ç§»åŠ¨ç¡¬ç›˜çš„ S.M.A.R.T ä¿¡æ¯äº†ã€‚

ç„¶åæˆ‘åˆç®€å•ç ”ç©¶äº†ä¸€ä¸‹å„ä¸ª S.M.A.R.T å„ä¸ªå€¼çš„å«ä¹‰æ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆã€‚ VALUE ä»£è¡¨å½“å‰çš„å€¼ï¼Œ WORST ä»£è¡¨ç›®å‰æ£€æµ‹åˆ°çš„æœ€å·®çš„å€¼ï¼Œ THRESH ä»£è¡¨æŸåé˜ˆå€¼ã€‚è¿™äº›å€¼éƒ½æ˜¯ä» RAW_VALUE è¿›è¡Œè®¡ç®—åå½’ä¸€åŒ–è€Œæ¥ã€‚ç„¶å TYPE åˆ†ä¸ºä¸¤ç§ï¼Œä¸€æ˜¯ Pre-fail ï¼Œä»£è¡¨å¦‚æœè¿™ä¸€é¡¹çš„å€¼å°äºé˜ˆå€¼ï¼Œä»£è¡¨è¿™ä¸ªæœºå™¨å¾ˆå±é™©äº†ï¼Œèµ¶ç´§æ‹·æ•°æ®ä¸¢æ‰å§ã€‚äºŒæ˜¯ Old_age ï¼Œä»£è¡¨å¦‚æœè¿™ä¸€é¡¹å°äºé˜ˆå€¼ï¼Œä»£è¡¨è¿™ä¸ªæœºå™¨æ¯”è¾ƒè€äº†ï¼Œä½†è¿˜æ²¡åã€‚çœŸæ­£è¦çœ‹æ˜¯å¦åäº†ï¼Œå¯ä»¥çœ‹ When_Failed ä¸€æ ã€‚

entry.title: åœ¨ macOS å’Œ Linux ä¹‹é—´æ­å»º tinc ç½‘ç»œ
entry.content:
ä¸€ç›´å¬è¯´ tinc æ¯”è¾ƒç§‘å­¦ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å°è¯•è‡ªå·±ç”¨ tinc æ­å»ºä¸€ä¸ªç½‘ç»œã€‚è¿™é‡Œï¼ŒmacOS è¿™æ®µæ²¡æœ‰å›ºå®š IP åœ°å€ï¼ŒLinux æœºå™¨æœ‰å›ºå®š IP åœ°å€ linux_ip ã€‚å‡è®¾ç½‘ç»œåç§°ä¸º example , macOS ç«¯åä¸º macos åœ°å€ä¸º 192.168.0.2, linux ç«¯åä¸º linux åœ°å€ä¸º 192.168.0.1ã€‚

åœ¨ macOS ä¸Šé…ç½®ï¼š

brew install tinc
mkdir -p /usr/local/etc/tinc/example

æ–°å»º /usr/local/etc/tinc/example/tinc.conf:

Name = macos
Device = utun0 # use an unused number
ConnectTo = linux

ç¼–è¾‘ /usr/local/etc/tinc/example/tinc-up:

#!/bin/sh
ifconfig $INTERFACE 192.168.0.2 192.168.0.1 mtu 1500 netmask 255.255.255.255

å’Œ /usr/local/etc/tinc/example/tinc-down:

#!/bin/sh
ifconfig $INTERFACE down

è¿˜æœ‰ /usr/local/etc/tinc/example/subnet-up:

#!/bin/sh
[ "$NAME" = "$NODE" ] && exit 0
/usr/local/opt/iproute2mac/bin/ip route add $SUBNET dev $INTERFACE

ä»¥åŠ /usr/local/etc/tinc/example/subnet-down:

#!/bin/sh
[ "$NAME" = "$NODE" ] && exit 0
/usr/local/opt/iproute2mac/bin/ip route del $SUBNET dev $INTERFACE

ç„¶åå°†å®ƒä»¬éƒ½è®¾ä¸ºå¯æ‰§è¡Œçš„ï¼š

chmod +x tinc-up
chmod +x tinc-down
chmod +x subnet-down
chmod +x subnet-down

ç¼–è¾‘ /usr/local/etc/tinc/example/macos:

Port = 655
Subnet = 192.168.0.1/24

æ‰§è¡Œ tincd -n example -K ç”Ÿæˆå¯†é’¥ã€‚

åˆ° Linux æœºå™¨ä¸Šï¼š ç¼–è¾‘ä»¥ä¸‹æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š

$ mkdir -p /etc/tinc/example/hosts
$ cat /etc/tinc/example/tinc.conf
Name = linux
$ cat /etc/tinc/example/tinc-up
$!/bin/sh
ip link set $INTERFACE up
ip addr add 192.168.0.1/24 dev $INTERFACE
$ cat /etc/tinc/example/tinc-down
$!/bin/sh
ip addr del 192.168.0.1/24 dev $INTERFACE
ip link set $INTERFACE down
$ cat /etc/tinc/example/hosts/linux
Address = linux_ip
Port = 655
Subnet = 192.168.0.1/24
$ tincd -n example -K

æ¥ç€ï¼ŒæŠŠ linux ä¸Š /etc/tinc/example/hosts/linux æ‹·è´åˆ° macos çš„ /usr/local/etc/tinc/example/hosts/linux ï¼Œç„¶åæŠŠ macos ä¸Š /usr/local/etc/tinc/example/hosts/macos æ‹·è´åˆ° /etc/tinc/example/hosts/macos ã€‚åœ¨ä¸¤å°æœºå™¨ä¸Šéƒ½ tinc -n example -D -d3 å³å¯çœ‹åˆ°è¿æ¥çš„å»ºç«‹ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ ping å³å¯éªŒè¯ç½‘ç»œå»ºç«‹æˆåŠŸã€‚

2018-05-29 Update: Android ä¸Šï¼Œåˆ©ç”¨ Tinc GUI ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥æŠŠ Tinc è¿è¡Œèµ·æ¥ï¼Œåªæ˜¯é…ç½®ä¸å¤§ä¸€æ ·ï¼š

$ cat tinc.conf
Name = example
Device = /dev/tun
Mode = switch
ConnectTo = remote
ScriptsInterpreter = /system/bin/sh
$ cat tinc-up
#!/bin/sh
ip link set $INTERFACE up
ip addr add local_ip/24 dev $INTERFACE
$ cat tinc-down
#!/bin/sh
ip addr del local_ip/24 dev $INTERFACE
ip link set $INTERFACE down
$ cat subnet-up
$!/bin/bash
[ "$NAME" = "$NODE" ] && exit 0
ip route add $SUBNET dev $INTERFACE metric $WEIGHT table local
$ cat subnet-down
#!/bin/bash
[ "$NAME" = "$NODE" ] && exit 0
ip route del $SUBNET dev $INTERFACE table local

æ³¨æ„ table local çš„ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚éœ€è¦ Root ã€‚

ç„¶åã€‚ã€‚ã€‚

ç„¶åå°±å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨Gentoo/Prefixäº†ã€‚æ³¨æ„ï¼æ­¤æ—¶çš„ $PATH ä»…é™äº $EPREFIX ä¸‹å‡ ä¸ªç›®å½•å’Œ /usr/bin /bin æ‰€ä»¥å¾ˆå¤šä¸œè¥¿éƒ½ä¼šå‡ºé—®é¢˜ï¼ˆEmacs, Vim, Fish etcï¼‰ã€‚å°å¿ƒä¸è¦æŠŠè‡ªå·±çš„ç›®å½•ä»€ä¹ˆçš„ææŒ‚äº†ã€‚

entry.title: In macOS Sierra, Karabiner-Elements finally support complex modifications
entry.content:
In favor of this commit, Karabiner-Elements now supports the much welcomed yet long-lost feature, namely complex modifications that enable users to trigger complex keypress.

Now I can achieve this:

If I press <Enter>, then:
1. If <Enter> is pressed alone, then send <Enter>.
2. If <Enter> is pressed along with other keys, then send <Control> + Other.

By adding this code to ~/.config/karabiner/karabiner.json :

"complex_modifications": {
    "rules": [
        {
            "manipulators": [
                {
                    "description": "Change return_or_enter to left_control. (Post return_or_enter if pressed alone)",
                    "from": {
                        "key_code": "return_or_enter",
                        "modifiers": {
                            "optional": [
                                "any"
                            ]
                        }
                    },
                    "to": [
                        {
                            "key_code": "left_control"
                        }
                    ],
                    "to_if_alone": [
                        {
                            "key_code": "return_or_enter"
                        }
                    ],
                    "type": "basic"
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
},

in one of profiles.

Note: the snippet above is adopted from this example. You can explore more examples since the GUI is not updated accordingly yet.

Important: Until NOW (2017-06-15), this feature is only implemented in beta versions of Karabiner-Elements (at least 0.91.1).

entry.title: Screen Capturing Tips in macOS
entry.content:
Iâ€™m sure many people have already known this. But i havenâ€™t memorize it yet.

How to screen capture:

Shift+Command+3: Capture fullscreen.
Shift+Command+4: Capture region.
               : Press space to capture window. 
               : Hold option and drag, then
               : you will capture a region with its center in where you started dragging 
               : and one of its corners under your cursor.
Ctrl+OneOfTheTwoAbove: Capture to clipboard.
defaults write com.apple.screencapture location: Change the default location storing the images.

Apps enhancing the snapshots: Snappy and Mapture.

See more detailed here.
